docs.title: 区域分布
docs.text: { "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "description": "房屋数量按区域分布", "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2022/rental-all-by-district.csv" }, "width": 300, "transform": [ {"joinaggregate": [{"op": "median", "field": "mean", "as": "median-line"}]} ], "mark": {"type": "arc", "innerRadius": 50, "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "theta": {"field": "count", "type": "quantitative", "stack": true}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} }, "order": {"field": "count", "type": "quantitative", "sort": "descending"} } }

docs.title: 租金趋势
docs.text: { "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "description": "Stock prices of 5 Tech Companies over Time.", "vconcat": [ { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2022/rental-monthly-by-district.csv" }, "mark": {"type": "line", "point": true, "tooltip": true}, "params": [ { "name": "district", "select": {"type": "point", "fields": ["district"]}, "bind": "legend" } ], "encoding": { "x": { "field": "month", "type": "quantitative", "axis": {"tickMinStep": 1} }, "y": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "整租租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} }, "opacity": { "condition": {"param": "district", "value": 1}, "value": 0.05 } } }, { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2022/rental-per-area-monthly-by-district.csv" }, "mark": {"type": "line", "point": true, "tooltip": true}, "params": [ { "name": "district", "select": {"type": "point", "fields": ["district"]}, "bind": "legend" } ], "encoding": { "x": { "field": "month", "type": "quantitative", "axis": {"tickMinStep": 1} }, "y": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "每平米租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} }, "opacity": { "condition": {"param": "district", "value": 1}, "value": 0.05 } } } ], "config": {"axisY": {"minExtent": 50}} }

docs.title: 排行榜
docs.text:
{ "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "description": "Stock prices of 5 Tech Companies over Time.", "hconcat": [ { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2022/rental-all-by-district.csv" }, "transform": [ { "joinaggregate": [ {"op": "median", "field": "mean", "as": "median-line"} ] } ], "layer": [ { "mark": {"type": "bar", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "y": { "field": "district", "type": "ordinal", "sort": "-x", "title": "区域" }, "x": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "整租租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} } } }, { "mark": {"type": "rule", "color": "red", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "x": { "aggregate": "median", "field": "median-line", "type": "quantitative" } } } ] }, { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2022/rental-per-area-all-by-district.csv" }, "transform": [ { "joinaggregate": [ {"op": "median", "field": "mean", "as": "median-line"} ] } ], "layer": [ { "mark": {"type": "bar", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "y": { "field": "district", "type": "ordinal", "sort": "-x", "title": null }, "x": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "每平米租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} } } }, { "mark": {"type": "rule", "color": "red", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "x": { "aggregate": "median", "field": "median-line", "type": "quantitative" } } } ] } ] }

{ "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2022/rental-per-area-all-by-subdistrict.csv" }, "mark": {"type": "bar", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "y": {"field": "subdistrict", "type": "ordinal", "sort": "-x"}, "x": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "每平米租金"}, "tooltip": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative"} } }

docs.title: 区域分布
docs.text: { "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "description": "房屋数量按区域分布", "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2023/rental-all-by-district.csv" }, "width": 300, "transform": [ {"joinaggregate": [{"op": "median", "field": "mean", "as": "median-line"}]} ], "mark": {"type": "arc", "innerRadius": 50, "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "theta": {"field": "count", "type": "quantitative", "stack": true}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} }, "order": {"field": "count", "type": "quantitative", "sort": "descending"} } }

docs.title: 租金趋势
docs.text: { "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "description": "Stock prices of 5 Tech Companies over Time.", "vconcat": [ { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2023/rental-monthly-by-district.csv" }, "mark": {"type": "line", "point": true, "tooltip": true}, "params": [ { "name": "district", "select": {"type": "point", "fields": ["district"]}, "bind": "legend" } ], "encoding": { "x": { "field": "month", "type": "quantitative", "axis": {"tickMinStep": 1} }, "y": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "整租租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} }, "opacity": { "condition": {"param": "district", "value": 1}, "value": 0.05 } } }, { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2023/rental-per-area-monthly-by-district.csv" }, "mark": {"type": "line", "point": true, "tooltip": true}, "params": [ { "name": "district", "select": {"type": "point", "fields": ["district"]}, "bind": "legend" } ], "encoding": { "x": { "field": "month", "type": "quantitative", "axis": {"tickMinStep": 1} }, "y": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "每平米租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} }, "opacity": { "condition": {"param": "district", "value": 1}, "value": 0.05 } } } ], "config": {"axisY": {"minExtent": 50}} }

docs.title: 排行榜
docs.text:
{ "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "description": "Stock prices of 5 Tech Companies over Time.", "hconcat": [ { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2023/rental-all-by-district.csv" }, "transform": [ { "joinaggregate": [ {"op": "median", "field": "mean", "as": "median-line"} ] } ], "layer": [ { "mark": {"type": "bar", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "y": { "field": "district", "type": "ordinal", "sort": "-x", "title": "区域" }, "x": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "整租租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} } } }, { "mark": {"type": "rule", "color": "red", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "x": { "aggregate": "median", "field": "median-line", "type": "quantitative" } } } ] }, { "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2023/rental-per-area-all-by-district.csv" }, "transform": [ { "joinaggregate": [ {"op": "median", "field": "mean", "as": "median-line"} ] } ], "layer": [ { "mark": {"type": "bar", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "y": { "field": "district", "type": "ordinal", "sort": "-x", "title": null }, "x": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "每平米租金"}, "color": { "field": "district", "type": "nominal", "scale": {"scheme": "tableau20"} } } }, { "mark": {"type": "rule", "color": "red", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "x": { "aggregate": "median", "field": "median-line", "type": "quantitative" } } } ] } ] }

{ "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json", "data": { "url": "../../assets/data/sh/2023/rental-per-area-all-by-subdistrict.csv" }, "mark": {"type": "bar", "tooltip": true}, "encoding": { "y": {"field": "subdistrict", "type": "ordinal", "sort": "-x"}, "x": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative", "title": "每平米租金"}, "tooltip": {"field": "mean", "type": "quantitative"} } }
